org.apache.livy

接口 JobContext


  • public interface JobContext
    Holds runtime information about the job execution context. An instance of this class is kept on the node hosting a remote Spark context and is made available to jobs being executed via RemoteSparkContext#submit().

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • sc

        org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext sc()
        返回:
        The shared SparkContext instance.

      • sqlctx

        org.apache.spark.sql.SQLContext sqlctx()
        返回:
        The shared SQLContext instance.

      • hivectx

        org.apache.spark.sql.hive.HiveContext hivectx()
        返回:
        The shared HiveContext instance.

      • streamingctx

        org.apache.spark.streaming.api.java.JavaStreamingContext streamingctx()
        返回:
        The JavaStreamingContext which has already been created.

      • getSharedObject

        <E> E getSharedObject(String name)
               throws NoSuchElementException
        Get shared object
        类型参数:
        E - The type of the shared object
        参数:
        name - Name of the shared object to return
        返回:
        The shared object matching name
        抛出:
        NoSuchElementException

      • setSharedObject

        <E> void setSharedObject(String name,
                         E object)
        Set shared object, it will replace the old one if already existed
        类型参数:
        E - The type of the shared object
        参数:
        name - Name of the shared object to be set
        object - The object to be set

      • removeSharedObject

        <E> E removeSharedObject(String name)
        Remove shared object from cache
        类型参数:
        E - The type of the shared object
        参数:
        name - Name of the shared object to be removed
        返回:
        The object that was removed

      • createStreamingContext

        void createStreamingContext(long batchDuration)
        Creates the SparkStreaming context.
        参数:
        batchDuration - Time interval at which streaming data will be divided into batches, in milliseconds.

      • stopStreamingCtx

        void stopStreamingCtx()
        Stops the SparkStreaming context.

      • getLocalTmpDir

        File getLocalTmpDir()
        返回:
        A local tmp dir specific to the context

      • sparkSession

        <E> E sparkSession()
            throws Exception
        类型参数:
        E - The type of the sparksession object
        返回:
        The SparkSession if it exists
        抛出:
        Exception - If SparkSession does not exist
